definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]

sentences.english: Crushing of granites; mining of coal, minerals embedded in siliceous rocks.
sentences.chinese: 花岗岩粉碎，采煤，硅酸盐矿石内植入矿物。

sentences.english: The Type MG(?)2-D electric-traction drum shearer was the first one manufactured completely in home-produced parts.
sentences.chinese: 型是第一台全部采用国产元部件的电牵引滚筒采煤机。

sentences.english: The chain guide frame of coal cutting machine is produced with metabainited cast steel.
sentences.chinese: 将准贝氏体铸钢应用于采煤机链轨架。

sentences.english: Excavate coal subsided water area is the special component of the surface water in Huainan.
sentences.chinese: 采煤塌陷水域已成为淮南市矿区一种特殊的地表水体。

sentences.english: The poor man is a coal digger.
sentences.chinese: 这个可怜的人是一个采煤工。

sentences.english: Finally discussed the optimized design method of the coal machine with the simulation results.
sentences.chinese: 最后探讨利用仿真结果对采煤机进行了最优化设计。

sentences.english: It can be connected with the coal cutter through a 5 core cable.
sentences.chinese: 该专用智能磁力起动器通过5芯电缆与采煤机连接。

sentences.english: Therefore it's difficult for us to buy the coal cutters of your production this year.
sentences.chinese: 因此，今年再购进你方生产的这种采煤机就有些困难。

sentences.english: Landscape ecological architecture in excavated coal diggings is one of attention-getting hotspots international society.
sentences.chinese: 采煤矿区景观生态设计是目前国内外关注的热点之一。

sentences.english: Mountaintop removal mining is considered the fastest, most cost-effective way to mine coal reserves.
sentences.chinese: 山巅移除采矿被认为是最快最省钱的采煤方法。

sentences.english: Therefore, will have brought forward higher request to coal mining machine navar.
sentences.chinese: 因此，对采煤机的控制系统就提出了更高的要求。

sentences.english: This old coal face is to be reworked next week.
sentences.chinese: 这个旧的采煤工作面下周将重新开采。

sentences.english: Slicing fully mechanized mining method is one of mining methods of thick seams.
sentences.chinese: 分层综采是厚煤层采煤方法之一。

sentences.english: Obvious benefits were introduced to replace the means of chamfering demolition mining by shield support mining.
sentences.chinese: 介绍用掩护支架采煤代替斜切爆破采煤法的显著效益。

sentences.english: Obvious benefits were introduced to replace the means of chamfering demolition mining by shield support mining.
sentences.chinese: 介绍用掩护支架采煤代替斜切爆破采煤法的显著效益。

sentences.english: We will accelerate the trial to transform the economies of cities that are dependent on resources that are now depleted and efforts to control sinkholes in coalmining areas.
sentences.chinese: 加快资源枯竭型城市经济转型试点和采煤沉陷区治理。

definition: waste rock (mining)/gangue (worthless minerals mixed in with coal or ore)
to prospect/to dig for coal or minerals
